thread.title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger tried to sign me, says Liverpool legend Robbie Fowler | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger tried to sign me, says Liverpool legend Robbie Fowler | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger tried to sign me, says Liverpool legend Robbie Fowler | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 12:06 pm Arsene Wenger was a big fan of Robbie Fowler (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger was a big fan of Robbie Fowler and tried more than once to sign him from Liverpool , the Reds legend has claimed. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
At his peak, Fowler was one of the deadliest strikers in the Premier League, and went on to score 231 goals in English football in a glittering career. 
Commenting on Wenger’s future at Arsenal in his column for the Daily Mirror , the former England forward admits he’d have loved to play for a side managed by the Frenchman. Fowler was one of the best strikers in the country on his day (Picture: Allsport)
